description.value:
Requirements You are wearing medium or heavy armor.

You hit a foe with your armor to throw them off balance. Make a fist Strike even if you don't have a hand free; if you're wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Gauntlet] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Spiked Gauntlet], you can make a Strike with one of those weapons instead. The Strike gains the following additional results.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against melee attacks you attempt against it until the end of your next turn.

Success The target is off-guard against the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your current turn.

Critical Failure You are off-guard against melee attacks the target attempts against you until the end of your next turn.
